mapper.select: select g.goods_num, c.qty, c.qty * g.goods_price as price_sum from cart c, goods g, member m where m.member_num = c.member_num and c.goods_num = g.goods_num and m.member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_ORDER (order_num, order_price, order_time, takeout, member_num, cook_state) VALUES (#{orderNum}, (select sum(price_sum) from ( select c.qty * g.goods_price as price_sum from cart c, goods g, member m where m.member_num = c.member_num and c.goods_num = g.goods_num and m.member_num = #{memberNum} ) ), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'RRRR-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'N', #{memberNum}, 'N')
mapper.select: select * from member_order where member_num = #{memberNum} order by order_num
select * from member_order where cook_state = 'N' order by order_num
